title: Email Marketing Fundamentals
description: This self-learning plan covers the essential concepts and best practices of email marketing for beginners.

weeks.title: Introduction to Email Marketing
learningObjectives: Understand the role and importance of email marketing in a digital marketing strategy
Learn the key components of an email marketing campaign
topicsToCover: Types of email campaigns (promotional, transactional, newsletters, etc.)
weeklyTasks: Research and compare popular email marketing platforms
Create a basic email marketing strategy for a small business

resources.name: The Anatomy of a Successful Email Campaign

weeks.title: Building an Email List
learningObjectives: Understand the importance of building a targeted email list
Learn effective techniques for list building and lead generation
topicsToCover: Lead capture tactics (opt-in forms, lead magnets, etc.)
weeklyTasks: Create a lead magnet and opt-in form for a website
Develop a plan for growing an email list organically

resources.name: 10 Proven Tactics to Grow Your Email List
Email List Segmentation: The Key to Personalized Email Marketing

weeks.title: Crafting Effective Email Content
learningObjectives: Learn best practices for writing engaging email copy
Understand the importance of email design and layout
topicsToCover: Email body content structure and formatting
weeklyTasks: Write and design a sample promotional email campaign
Analyze and critique email newsletters from industry leaders

resources.name: 7 Tips for Writing Irresistible Email Copy
The Anatomy of a High-Performing Email

weeks.title: Email Marketing Automation and Optimization
learningObjectives: Understand the role of email automation in a marketing strategy
Learn techniques for optimizing email campaigns for better performance
topicsToCover: A/B testing and email performance analysis
weeklyTasks: Create a simple email automation workflow
Develop a plan for testing and optimizing email campaigns

resources.name: The Beginner's Guide to Email Automation
Email Marketing Metrics: What to Track and How to Improve
